My husband and I ate here twice during our week in Miami. The food was delicious and the staff could not have been more welcoming. A real treat.

Real Italian food and the best service I have ever experienced at a restaurant. The atmosphere and people are great as well.

Realy good italiana food.. i order risoto marinara- shrimps and see food too much in risoto... i recomend for spend time here... eat and talk. Staff very nice .

Small restaurant but great homemade food, this was the second time I ate here. They are very attentive and make sure that you love their meals!

Great food, wonderful service. My risotto was amazing. I would have thought I was in Rome. My husband's tuna in spaghetti was equally good and dessert was a rich chocolate cake. You could not ask for better Italian food. Pricey but so worth it.

sales, sandwiches, soups.... all fine in this take out, which is quite nice for lonely travelers, as you have a long counter where you can sit, eat and watch the people dropping by or filing up for the huge sandwiches, decorated with generosity. Quick service, friendly waiters.

Stayed at the Mondrian for a long weekend and basically ate lunch at the pool each day. The food was above & beyond anything I expected to have poolside. The Spicy Shrimp skewers and amazing and so are the Chicken Wing appetizer. Also the fresh coconut water is a nice touch.

Good choices of drinks and some foods, but extremely over priced. I had a cup of coffee (late) at $7 after lunch, that made Starbucks feel like a very cheap coffee place. Coke at 5.00 (no refills) and a small cup of juice for 9.00.

I recently visited Mondrian South Beach and had enjoyed the entire facilities especially the pool. It was amazing with many happy and beautiful people with fantastic service. I look forward returning very soon and will recomend to all my friends.

everything esepcially the cold pressed drinks were great. loved the quinoa, kale and chicken salad and the rolls

great drinks and sushi- staff nice- cocktails were great too- enjoyed the view and it was delicious- will be back there for sure

It was a pleasure to dine here at this location. Awesome views and excellent food. The service was extremely courteous and with a smile. Salads are excellent, fruits - fresh and beautifully displayed. All serving cutlery was in place, and everything was neatly kept and very clean. All creating a very nice dining atmosphere.
Will definitely go back.

We had sushi here and inside as well as a hamburger which were all very good. Chantel served us most of the time. She brought us a drink in the morning. Her service was impeccable. Karen waited on us when she wasn't there and she was very good but did not have the personality of Chantel.

As a traveler, you tend to stay where courteous staff go the extra mile for you to enjoy your vacation I must say me and my hubby enjoyed the poolside grille SUPERB service food drinks and very big smiles !!! very good I recommend the cuban sandwich mmmmm

As I mentioned earlier, the beach is several blocks away, but why leave the hotel when you've got access to a gorgeous poolside bay view as well as attentive servers who will bring amazing drinks and tasty menu selections!

seafood cobb salad and crab cake sliders were great! Had the regular and berry mojitos too which were real good too
